query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Quel sol che pria d’amor mi scaldò ’l petto, 2 di bella verità m’avea scoverto, 3 provando e riprovando, il dolce aspetto;
query.error: **English:** 1 That sun which formerly warmed my breast with love, 2 had revealed to me, with its beautiful truth, 3 through testing and re-testing, its sweet aspect;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 e io, per confessar corretto e certo 5 me stesso, tanto quanto si convenne 6 leva’ il capo a proferer più erto;
query.error: **English:** 4 and I, in order to confess correctly and certainly 5 myself, as much as was fitting, 6 raised my head to speak more loftily;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 ma visïone apparve che ritenne 8 a sé me tanto stretto, per vedersi, 9 che di mia confession non mi sovvenne.
query.error: **English:** 7 but a vision appeared that held me 8 so tightly to itself, to be seen, 9 that I did not remember my confession.
query.result: 7 kim tu darśanam prādurbabhūva yat dhṛtam 8 mām sva-paśyāmi, 9 yataḥ mama ātma-svikṛtir na smṛtā.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 10 Yathā ve trikopavitreṣu nirmaleṣu vā, 11 Jaleṣu vā nirmaleṣu śānteṣu ca, 12 Na tathā gambhīreṣu yathā taleṣu na dṛśyante,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 tornan d’i nostri visi le postille 14 debili sì, che perla in bianca fronte 15 non vien men forte a le nostre pupille;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 tali vid’ io più facce a parlar pronte; 17 per ch’io dentro a l’error contrario corsi 18 a quel ch’accese amor tra l’omo e ’l fonte.
query.error: **English:** 16 thus I saw more faces ready to speak; 17 so that I fell into the opposite error 18 to that which kindled love between the man and the spring.
query.result: 16 Tathā aham adhikaṃ vaktuṃ udyuktāni vaktrāṇi apaśyam, 17 Tena aham viparīte mohe papātaṃ, 18 Yena puruṣeṇa ca jale ca madhye prema jātam āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 Sùbito sì com’ io di lor m’accorsi, 20 quelle stimando specchiati sembianti, 21 per veder di cui fosser, li occhi torsi;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 22 na ca kim api adṛkṣam, punar api tāṃ 23 mṛdu mārga darśikasya prakāśe sthāpayām āsa, 24 yaḥ hasan, dīpyate śubhre netre.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 ma te rivolve, come suole, a vòto: 29 vere sustanze son ciò che tu vedi, 30 qui rilegate per manco di voto.
query.error: **English:** 28 but turns you, as usual, to your desire: 29 these are real substances that you see, 30 confined here for lack of a vow.
query.result: 28 api tu tvāṃ parivartayati, yathā svabhāvataḥ, icchāyā: 29 satyāḥ vastavaḥ santi yāḥ tvam paśyasi, 30 ihāvasthitāḥ vratakṣayatvāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
49 ma riconoscerai ch’i’ son Piccarda, 50 che, posta qui con questi altri beati, 51 beata sono in la spera più tarda.
query.error: **English:** 49 but you will recognize that I am Piccarda, 50 who, placed here with these other blessed ones, 51 am blessed in the slowest sphere.
query.result: 49 Kim tu jānīṣe yad aham Piccardā, 50 Yā, atra anyaiḥ etaiḥ subhagair yuktaḥ, 51 Subhagā asmi viśeṣeṇa mandatarake.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

100 perché fino al morir si vegghi e dorma 101 con quello sposo ch’ogne voto accetta 102 che caritate a suo piacer conforma.

query.prompt:

103 Dal mondo, per seguirla, giovinetta 104 fuggi’mi, e nel suo abito mi chiusi 105 e promisi la via de la sua setta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 106 Naraḥ paścāt, pāpāya adhikaṃ śubhāt, 107 madhurad āśramād bahiḥ apahāriṣuḥ: 108 Devaḥ eva jānāti paścāt mama jīvitam katham āsīt.

130 e ciò mi fece a dimandar più tardo.
